name: Spendlytime - Developer
description: This extension is used to track your time on the Internet.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; script-src-elem * 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 ws://localhost:8000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
